name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth and frothy.
tips: Try layering with fresh or frozen fruit. Make a smoothie ice pop! Simply freeze 1⁄2 recipe in Epicure Ice Pop Mold for 4 hours for a healthy frozen treat!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice whole-grain toast with 2 tsp nut butter.
